remarks: Associativity of vector sum.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Oct-2013.)
statement:
dvhvaddcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhvaddcl.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvaddcl.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvaddcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvaddcl.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvhvaddcl.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` D ) $.
dvhvaddcl.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
dvhvaddass $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. ( T X. E ) /\ G e. ( T X. E ) /\ I e. ( T X. E ) ) ) -> ( ( F .+ G ) .+ I ) = ( F .+ ( G .+ I ) ) ) $.
